com.sc.hm.otl.core

Interface OTLSyncScopeManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.opentracing.ScopeManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OTLSyncScopeManagerImpl

    public interface OTLSyncScopeManager
extends io.opentracing.ScopeManager
    The OTL scope manager interface that extend the opentracing ScopeManager. This scope manager is a sync scope manager, and can be used while performing any synchronous task. The system property scope.manager.type will determine the scope manager that will be used within a tracer. The default nature of the scopemanager is sync. Because this scope manager supports only synchronous operation, hence it uses the ThreadLocal to store the current Scope. A synchronous scope manager will always use a OTLSyncScope to store the span hierarchy.
    Author:
    Sudiptasish Chanda
